howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple setup, powerful results in just three steps.

step1.title: Register Users
step1.description: Add students or employees with unique RFID cards

step2.title: Scan & Track
step2.description: ESP32 readers capture attendance with timestamps
step2.descriptionCompany: ESP32 readers capture time tracking with timestamps

step3.title: Monitor & Report
step3.description: View live data and generate detailed analytics

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of organizations already using Synctuario for seamless attendance management.
cta.subtitleCompany: Join hundreds of organizations already using Synctuario for seamless time tracking management.

about.title: About the Synctuario Attendance System
about.titleCompany: About the Synctuario Time Tracking System
about.description: The Synctuario Attendance System is a robust, easy-to-use platform designed for schools and companies to automate attendance tracking using RFID technology.
about.descriptionCompany: The Synctuario Time Tracking System is a robust, easy-to-use platform designed for companies to automate employee time tracking using RFID technology.
featuresList: Effortlessly register and track attendance with RFID cards or tags scanned via ESP32 devices.
View live attendance data with detailed reports and analytics accessible to admins and teachers.
Different access levels for admins and teachers ensure security and proper permissions.
Supports English and French to cater to diverse user bases.
Flexible monthly and yearly subscription plans for schools and companies of all sizes.
Get a 15-day free trial when you sign up.
Works for both schools and companies ‚Äî fully adaptable.
Your data is securely saved and available for future use.
When an admin registers, a unique API key is generated for secure device communication.
Student or employee UID changes can only be made by an admin or CEO, and the ID owner will be notified.
Attendance records can be exported in Excel format.
featuresListCompany: Effortlessly register and track employee time with RFID cards or tags scanned via ESP32 devices.
View live time tracking data with detailed reports and analytics accessible to CEOs and managers.
Different access levels for CEOs and managers ensure security and proper permissions.
Supports English and French to cater to diverse user bases.
Flexible monthly and yearly subscription plans for companies of all sizes.
Get a 15-day free trial when you sign up.
Fully adaptable for any company size and structure.
Your data is securely saved and available for future use.
When a CEO registers, a unique API key is generated for secure device communication.
Employee UID changes can only be made by a CEO, and the employee will be notified.
Time tracking records can be exported in Excel format.
about.howItWorksDescription: Students or employees are registered with unique RFID cards. When a card is scanned on the ESP32 reader, the system logs the attendance with timestamps.
about.howItWorksDescriptionCompany: Employees are registered with unique RFID cards. When a card is scanned on the ESP32 reader, the system logs the time tracking with timestamps.
whyChooseList: Reduces manual attendance errors and time spent.
Provides insightful analytics to improve school/company performance.
Scales easily with your organization's growth.
Backed by ongoing support and feature updates.
Includes a secure API system for syncing attendance devices.
whyChooseListCompany: Reduces manual time tracking errors and time spent.
Provides insightful analytics to improve company performance.
Scales easily with your organization's growth.
Backed by ongoing support and feature updates.
Includes a secure API system for syncing time tracking devices.
about.subscriptionDescription: Choose between monthly and yearly subscriptions tailored to your institution's size and needs.
about.subscriptionDescriptionCompany: Choose between monthly and yearly subscriptions tailored to your company's size and needs.
about.getStartedDescription: Contact us using the form above or click the buttons to subscribe and take control of your attendance management.
about.getStartedDescriptionCompany: Contact us using the form above or click the buttons to subscribe and take control of your time tracking management.
